meanings.definition: To become pink or pinker in color.
meanings.sent1: The sun slowly pinkens the sky at dawn.
meanings.sent2: Her cheeks pinkens when she feels embarrassed.
meanings.sent3: The flower pinkens happily under the warm sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The horizon pinkens as the day comes to an end.
meanings.sent5: The paint pinkens as it dries, revealing its true color.

meanings.definition: To make something pink or pinker in color.
meanings.sent1: She pinkens her cheeks with a rosy blush.
meanings.sent2: The artist pinkens the canvas with delicate strokes.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally pinkens his white shirt in the laundry.
meanings.sent4: The sunset pinkens the clouds in a breathtaking display.
meanings.sent5: The dye slowly pinkens the fabric, creating a beautiful hue.
